articles.title: Party, State Commendations Conferred on Contributors to Successful Satellite Launch in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Party, State Commendations Conferred on Contributors to Successful Satellite Launch in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- There took place a ceremony of conferring party and state commendations on the scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on the Wednesday morning. 
					 Present at the ceremony was Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 He declared the beginning of the ceremony and made a congratulatory speech. 
					
					 He said that space conquers who demonstrated the self-esteem and authority of our great state and indomitable mettle of the strong people over the world were the best patriots and admirable heroes of Juche Korea.
					
					 He noted that the great success of the satellite launch is a crystal of the intense loyalty to the party, ardent patriotism and sweat of the scientists of Juche Korea.
					
					 Our party values patriotism of the scientists loyal to the party and revolution, he noted.
					
					 He, on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea, extended gratitude once again to space conquerors who instilled sure conviction and courage into the service personnel and people of the DPRK rushing forward like wind toward the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and made distinguished contribution to implementing the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He indicated the principled stand and strategic tasks of the WPK on the space development.
					
					 Conquering space is not just the path of science but that of revolution, independence and self-sustenance and the drive for defending the leader and upholding the party's policies to implement the behests of the great leaders, and a fierce class struggle against the hostile forces seeking to usurp our peace and sovereignty, he said.
					
					 He underscored the need to successfully launch more working satellites of Juche Korea faster by conducting a dynamic campaign of intelligence and drive of breaking through the cutting edge as demanded by the new era of Chollima and Mallima in order to more dynamically pave a wide avenue to occupying space.
					
					 He called upon the space science field to hold high the banner in glorifying the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as the one of victory and glory. He set forth the concrete tasks and ways of doing so.
					
					 He underscored the need to hold fast to Kim Jong Il's behests as the important guidelines, unconditionally and thoroughly implement them without an inch of deflection and concession and thus glorify forever the immortal feats he performed in building space power, thoroughly establish the party's unitary leadership system and give full play to the indomitable Kunjari spirit and the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 The advance toward space, the motive force of science and technology of future and economic development, is the DPRK's strategic goal, he said, calling for pushing forward the space development according to the five-year plan for national space development.
					
					 Then, a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was read out.
					
					 Kim Jong Un personally awarded to the members who contributed to the successful launch of the satellite Kim Jong Il Order, and the title of DPRK Hero and gold star medal and Order of National Flag First Class.
					
					 The ceremony took place that afternoon.
					
					 Kim Jong Il Prize, watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, citations of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK and citations of KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un were awarded there.
					
					 Many scientists, technicians, workers and officials were awarded Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize, title of People's Scientist, the title of Merited Scientist and other honorary titles, Order of National Flag First Class, labor orders and other orders and medals.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the scientists, technicians, workers and officials who demonstrated the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation before the world through the great successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmongsong-4.
					 He congratulated the space conquerors who contributed to significantly celebrating the February spring holiday by launching the satellite shining with the august name of leader Kim Jong Il into the space and provided the people turning out as one toward the glorious May with the laurel of victory and had a photo session with them.
					
					 At the end of the session, he waved his hand to the participants shouting hurrah with excitement.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the participants would bring about uninterrupted miracles and innovations in the researches for the development of the nation's space science and technology and discharge their duty as pacesetters and standard-bearers in carrying out the party's policy of attaching importance to science and technology. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Man Gon and Pak To Chun.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by Kazbek Taysaev, first vice-chairman of the Committee for Commonwealth of Independent States Affairs, Eurasia Integration and Liaison with Compatriots of the State Duma and secretary of the Central Committee of the party, left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Myanmar President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Myanmar President
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Thein Sein, president of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar, on Feb. 9.
					 In the message the Myanmar president said that he was pleased to extend warm congratulations and best wishes to HE Kim Jong Un on behalf of the people of Myanmar and on his own behalf on the occasion of the auspicious birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The message expressed conviction that the DPRK would further develop and its people would achieve steady progress and prosperity under the seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un happiness and success and the DPRK steady development.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, who was born as the son of guerillas on Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution, and grew up to be the great revolutionary, wisely led the revolution and construction to the ever-victorious road for a long period and performed immortal feats for the country, people, era and history. It went on:
					
					 He turned the motherland into an invincible political and ideological power which achieved single-minded unity and made it demonstrate its might as the full-fledged nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher any enemy dares not provoke. His feats are the greatest one to be praised by the Korean nation.
					
					 The noble feats of Kim Jong Il who adorned his whole life with warm love for the country and nation and noble devotion have long been kept in the hearts of the fellow countrymen and mankind and will shine long with Songun Korea which will prosper.
					
					 The safety of Kim Jong Un is the ardent wishes and hope of all Koreans and world progressives, the letter said, wishing him good health.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador and Military Attache Give Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador and Military Attache Give Reception
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and Alexei Bartusov, military attache of the Russian embassy here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday to mark the Day of Defenders of the Motherland. 
					 Present there on invitation were No Kwang Chol, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.

articles.title: Chinese Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Chinese guests and Koreans in China staying here to take part in the 20th Kimjongilia Festival visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They were a delegation of the Shengchao Cultural Disseminating Co. Ltd. of Shanghai, China, a delegation of the Songzhuang Handcrafts Co. Ltd. in Beijing, China and a Chinese regional delegation for disseminating and supporting immortal flowers.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and patriotic life of his family members, they looked round the historical relics preserved with much care at the old home of the President.
					
					 They also went round the Sci-Tech Complex, the Rungna Dolphinarium, etc.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front Friday visited the venue of the 20th Kimjongilia Festival on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 They went round the venue of the festival which presented spectacular scenery with the immortal flowers in full bloom.

articles.title: 20th Kimjongilia Festival in DPRK
articles.content:
20th Kimjongilia Festival in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The venue of the 20th Kimjongilia Festival, opened here on Feb. 15 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, is crowded with many visitors every day.
					 On display at the festival are more than 30,000 potted Kimjongilias presented by 80 units and individuals of the country and overseas compatriots and foreigners, according to Ri Pyong Pha, department director of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.
					
					 At the festival there are stands arranged by the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, the State Academy of Sciences and other commissions, ministries and national institutions. Those stands of flowers show the Korean people's deep yearning and reverence for leader Kim Jong Il, who put the strength of the DPRK on the highest level and devoted all his life to the country's prosperity and the people's well-being.
					
					 There are also stands modeled after Mirae Scientists Street, the Sci-Tech Complex and satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 showing the reality of the DPRK. They give a glimpse of the Korean people's fixed will to translate the noble intention of Kim Jong Il into reality under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 On the stand prepared by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan are hundreds of potted Kimjongilias with a photo of Kim Jong Il meeting with Japan-resident compatriots to show the road ahead of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Besides, displayed at the festival are potted Kimjongilias presented by embassies of different countries and missions of international bodies in Pyongyang and friendship and solidarity organizations and personages of various countries.
					
					 The festival clearly shows that the reverence for Kim Jong Il of the Koreans and the world progressive people are growing deeper with each passing day.

articles.title: Steps Taken in DPRK to Prevent Zika Virus
articles.content:
Steps Taken in DPRK to Prevent Zika Virus
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A campaign has been launched in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to prevent the infection of Zika virus, which is now rapidly spreading through the world.
					 According to Hong Sun Gwang, vice-president of the State Sanitary Inspection Board under the Ministry of Public Health, the Zika virus is generally transmitted to humans by infected mosquitoes and it is dangerous especially to pregnant women.
					
					 Steps are taken to give citizens the knowledge about Zika virus and prevent the inroads of it into the country.
					
					 Quarantine stations in border areas began a strict inspection of travelers and cargos from the infected areas. And health workers are conducting the intensive hygienic information service related to the cause and process of Zika virus infection and its danger and preventive measure among citizens, pregnant women in particular.

articles.title: New Technical Innovations Made in Fish Farming of DPRK
articles.content:
New Technical Innovations Made in Fish Farming of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- New technical innovations have been made in the field of fish farming of the DPRK to hasten the work for putting pisciculture on a scientific and intensive basis.
					 The Unha Spawning Station manufactured equipment helping raise the capacity of producing bulking feed, which is very digestible, while Wonsan University of Fisheries made movable hatching equipment to increase the production of fry.
					
					 The Pyongyang Catfish Farm developed a new kind of feed additive for fry with powder of Kumgang medical stone, which is effective in raising the weight of fry.
					
					 The Microbiological Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences established a process for mass-producing from sea mud red yeast that contains various kinds of bio-active substances.

articles.title: Leading Papers Call for All-out Charge to Greet May Event
articles.content:
Leading Papers Call for All-out Charge to Greet May Event
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The leading newspapers Friday here call for an all-out  charge to greet the event of victors in May, when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held, in response to the joint calls published by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Rodong Sinmun says those joint calls put great spurs to the advance of the servicepersons and people in the DPRK to greet the event of victors in May.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The joint calls appeal to the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il workers to powerfully demonstrate the revolutionary spirit, all the agricultural workers to achieve a great victory on the front of agriculture and the fishermen to present the "spectacular scenery of a good catch of fish" in the Songun era. They also call for producing more world-competitive famous products and goods, making sure that the great heyday of construction continues without letup and supporting the Songun-based leadership of the Party by creating lots of masterpieces.
					
					 They underscore the need for the servicepersons to defend the 7th Congress of the WPK by bolstering up the political and military capabilities of the People's Army in every way, the young people to become heroes of the times and masters of creation in supporting the party and the officials to work and struggle like those in the period of laying down the Party's foundation for carrying forward the cause of Juche.
					
					 They encourage the servicepersons and people and give momentum to the advance in another Chollima age and Mallima age when uninterrupted changes are made in all spheres beyond recognition. Herein lie the tremendous attraction and driving force of the joint calls.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel of the People's Army and people are required to intensify the drive to implement the militant tasks set forth in the joint calls with confidence in victory and optimism and devote themselves to the above-said charge.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for all-out charge to greet the May event under the leadership of the great Party, united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism", a work published by leader Kim Jong Il on Feb. 19, Juche 63 (1974), is of special significance, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Friday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il declared the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), a historic event which brought about an epochal turn in developing the party and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 His wise guidance over the modeling of the whole party and society on the monolithic idea can find its manifestation in the fact that he clearly indicated the main duty and orientation of the party ideological work for firmly equipping party members and other working people with the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The WPK is the party of the leader. The leader laid a historical foundation of the WPK and its guiding idea and founded the party and consolidated its organization and ideology. Therefore, the ideological work of the WPK should be oriented to modeling the whole society on the revolutionary idea of the leader from A to Z.
					
					 In the early days Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and steadily improved the ideological work of the WPK for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism. He authored many original and encyclopedic works to glorify forever the revolutionary idea of the President and make sure that the party ideological work is thoroughly conducted as required by Kimilsungism.
					
					 He developed in depth the President's idea on attaching importance to arms into the Songun revolutionary idea, Songun political theory. This is the distinguished feat he performed by further enriching the treasure house of Kimilsungism and exceptionally increasing its attraction and vitality.

articles.title: Tok Islets Are Part of Inviolable Territory of Korea: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Tok Islets Are Part of Inviolable Territory of Korea: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Japan should properly understand the will of the Korean nation to defend Tok Islets and give up its foolish ambition to grab them, Minju Joson Friday says in a commentary. 
					 Noting that the Japanese reactionary ruling quarters are ferocious robbers accustomed to grabbing other's things, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Japs are such types of rogues who never fail to grab others' things once they eye them. They are, therefore, doggedly insisting that Tok Islets are Japan's territory in disregard of elementary international practice and requirements of international law on territory. 
					
					 No matter how desperately they insist, Tok Islets can never belong to Japan. 
					
					 Japan has no historical and legal reasons to raise a claim to Tok Islets. 
					
					 According to international usages, dominium over territory is to be granted to one who discovered and used it first. That is why Tok Islets are part of the inviolable territory of Korea. 
					
					 Japan's increased zeal to grab Tok Islets would only heighten the Korean nation's hatred against Japan.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Snipes at Projected U.S. THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Snipes at Projected U.S. THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea announced on Feb. 7 that it would negotiate with the U.S. for the deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					 Commenting on it, south Korean media termed the negotiations a gesture for clinching the deal, claiming that Washington and Seoul have already thrashed out such issues as deployment and operation expenses, site for deployment and offer of its infrastructure through informal contacts.
					
					 This proves that deployment of THAAD sparking concerns of Asian countries has entered the phase of execution after going beyond the stage of discussion.
					
					 THAAD, which Lockheed Martin developed and steadily increased its firing range with an investment of tens of millions dollars for years, is known to be capable of intercepting ultra supersonic objects flying even in outer space. 
					
					 The range of the X-band radar, its main component, reportedly covers thousands of kilometers.
					
					 In case THAAD is deployed in south Korea, the sphere of U.S. military domination will extend to the depth of the Asian continent only to trigger off a hot arms race for developing cutting-edge weapons and escalate military tensions in the region.
					
					 The Park regime is set to play a flagship role in carrying out the brigandish and hegemonic scenario of the U.S. to neutralize with MD system the military offensive capability of rapidly developing Asian countries, notably the regional powers, and establish the sphere of political, economic and military control in the region.
					
					 Calling Asian countries trade partners and the like in public, the Park regime is unhesitatingly bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the people in the region behind the scene, pursuant to the scenario of the U.S. It is as sly as a herd of foxes, the unpardonable common enemy of the Asian people.
					
					 The south Korean regime is justifying the deployment of THAAD under the pretext of "threat from nuclear weapons and missiles" of the DPRK. But no one will be taken in by such sophism.
					
					 The strong war deterrent for self-defence of the DPRK is means of justice for punishing the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation.
					
					 If the south Korean puppet regime persists in its puppy-like behavior, calculating that it can stifle the compatriots in the north and attain all other ill-advised purposes with the backing of outsiders, it will only precipitate their ruin when a merciless war of justice is launched by the service personnel and people of the DPRK against the U.S.
					
					 The political and military tensions to be ratcheted by the deployment of THAAD will inevitably lead to physical conflicts and, in this case, south Korea, a nuclear outpost of the U.S. for realizing its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific, will become a primary target of the neighboring countries.
					
					 In a word, the deployment of THAAD will only precipitate the self-destruction of the south Korean puppet regime.
					
					 The Park regime would be well advised to face up to the reality and stop running riot.

articles.title: Demo Staged in Protest against Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
Demo Staged in Protest against Deployment of THAAD 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society of south Korea staged a demonstration in protest against the south Korean authorities' reckless moves to introduce THAAD from the U.S., according to the south Korean internet news Voice of People. 
					 The association held a press conference in Seoul on February 16 to accuse the present regime of mulling introducing THAAD. 
					
					 The association declared it would continue the struggle till the regime stops the planned deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Stages Anti-U.S. Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Stages Anti-U.S. Struggle
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy staged a march toward the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Feb. 16.
					 They denounced the U.S. for plunging the Korean Peninsula into the danger of a war through the THAAD deployment and the Key Resolve joint military drills and introducing biochemical weapons into south Korea.
					
					 On the same day, the fascist police brutally cracked down upon members of the solidarity marching toward the U.S. embassy and walked them to their station.
					
					 The solidarity held a meeting outside the U.S. embassy and staged a demonstration on Feb. 13 demanding a stop to the THAAD deployment and joint military drills against the DPRK, conclusion of the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty and resignation of Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: THAAD Deployment Opposed in South Korea
articles.content:
THAAD Deployment Opposed in South Korea
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Measure Committee Opposing the Deployment of THAAD in Wonju comprising the public organizations in Wonju, Kangwon Province of south Korea held a press conference at the city office on Feb. 17, according to KBS in south Korea.
					 The speakers disclosed that Wonju, Phyongthaek in Kyonggi Province and Taegu are under discussion as the sites for the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 They said no to the deployment of THAAD in Wonju and any other parts of south Korea.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Anti-DPRK Provocation Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Anti-DPRK Provocation Denounced
 Tokyo, February 18 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan on February 15 made public a statement in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' anti-DPRK provocation. 
					 All the members of the union are greatly infuriated by the Japanese government's independent sanctions against the DPRK under the pretext of its H-bomb test and earth observation satellite launch, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Japan's decision to slap independent sanctions against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. and south Korea before any others is a dangerous provocation escalating the tension in the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The statement demanded the Japanese government immediately lift the unreasonable sanctions, vicious political suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and inhumane act of violating the fundamental rights of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Government's Sanctions against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Government's Sanctions against DPRK Slammed
Tokyo, February 18 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan issued a statement on Feb. 15 denouncing the Japanese authorities for their sanctions against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese government's decision to slap additional sanctions against the DPRK is unjustifiable as it escalates the tension in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia. 
					
					 Its action is an illegal act of confusing right and wrong and violating international law.
					
					 Its decision is an intolerable inhuman act of unreasonably restricting and suppressing the legitimate activities of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the life and right of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The statement urged the Japanese government to retract at once the unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK, Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Koreans in China Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Koreans in China Celebrate Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held celebrations in Yanji City, Jilin Province, China on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star.)
					 There took place a meeting of the association.
					
					 Present there were Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and other officials of the association, representatives of its affiliated regional associations and branches, the Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China and the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China, and Koreans in China.
					
					 Personages of China were present on invitation.
					
					 Choe Un Bok in a report said that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, who was born as the son of guerillas on Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution, and grew up to be the great revolutionary, wisely led the revolution and construction to the ever-victorious road for a long period and performed immortal feats for the country, people, era and history.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche is sure to win as Marshal Kim Jong Un, the peerlessly brilliant commander who is carrying forward the lineage of Mt. Paektu, is standing in the van of the Korean revolution and there are the invincible revolutionary army and all people who have achieved single-minded unity.
					
					 A letter to the Marshal was adopted.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants watched Korean film "2015, Year of Revolutionary Auspicious Events".
					
					 Then followed an art performance.
					
					 Earlier, the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China held an event on Feb. 12.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's exploits took place in Sweden, Finland and Egypt on February 8 and 10.
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also exhibited there were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK vigorously advancing toward the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Present there were figures of the Communist Party in Sweden, the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association and masses.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun as he developed the DPRK into a fortress of anti-imperialist independence by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician who developed and enriched the Juche idea, the great guiding idea in the era of independence, representing not only the 20th century but the 21st century.
					
					 The chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into a political and ideological power and a military power through his energetic Songun leadership.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars held in Sweden and Finland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Newspapers of India, Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Newspapers of India, Egypt
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Indian and Egyptian newspapers carried articles on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Indian newspaper Public News on February 6 said in an article titled "As core of the single-minded unity" that Kim Jong Il set the single-minded unity as a foundation of the revolution and firmly consolidated the single-minded unity of the Korean society with the army as core, holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					 The Indian newspaper Awaking on February 10 said in an article titled "Brilliant Songun commander and socialist Korea" that Marshal Kim Jong Un is resolutely smashing the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK with his matchless grit and pluck and ever-changing strategy and further glorifying the history of victory of the DPRK, true to the Songun idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 An Egyptian newspaper on February 9 said in an article:
					
					 The Korean people enacted the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il as the Day of the Shining Star and are significantly celebrating it with great joy.
					
					 This is because he devoted his all to the happiness of the Korean people and the prosperity of the country, performing immortal exploits.

articles.title: Delegations of Foreign Political Parties, Institution Pay Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Delegations of Foreign Political Parties, Institution Pay Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt and the Myanmar Medical Research Institute visited DPRK embassies in relevant countries between Feb. 11 and 13 to congratulate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The delegations laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and pictures of them standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, the great leaders, founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea and successfully applied them, turning the DPRK into a socialist power.
					
					 We extend sincere congratulations to HE Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					
					 The successful satellite launch is greatly encouraging not only the Korean people but the world progressives aspiring after independence and justice.
					
					 We will always support the policies of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A Korean photo, book and fine art exhibition was opened in Komsomolsk-na-Amure City, Russia on Feb. 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, books introducing the advantages and invincibility of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses and fine art works associated with the distinguished talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were a vice-mayor of the city, a vice-chairman of the Legislative Assembly and other officials.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of the smiling great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The vice-mayor of the city said that the exhibition will mark an important occasion in showing the DPRK developing day by day under the guidance of Kim Jong Un and the time-honored history, tradition and distinguished creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater success in the drive to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il this year, too.
					
					 The exhibition will go on till March 5.

articles.title: Korea Should Be Reunified on Basis of Inter-Korean Agreements: Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korea Should Be Reunified on Basis of Inter-Korean Agreements: Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity are fundamental principles of Korea's reunification" on its website on Feb. 9.
					 The article said: 
					
					 The government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea long ago advanced a proposal for concluding a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. to provide fundamentals for national reunification and has made strenuous efforts to implement the proposal in the new century, too.
					
					 The position of the signatories to a peace treaty promoted from non-nuclear weapons state vs nuclear weapons state to nuclear weapons state vs nuclear weapons state when the DPRK has become a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK, however, has remained unchanged in its stand to put an end to the state of ceasefire and create environment for the peaceful reunification.
					
					 The DPRK calls for reunifying the country on the three principles of national reunification and according to the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration agreed at the north-south summits.
					
					 This draws the unanimous support and welcome from the international community as well as the Korean nation.
					
					 Therefore, these agreements should be valued and Korea be reunified based on them.
					
					 It is north and south of Korea which are concerned with and urgently interested in national reunification.
					
					 Foreign forces' interference in the issue of Korea's reunification will fan up the confrontation between the north and the south.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Media Institutions of Nepal, Czech Republic
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Media Institutions of Nepal, Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Media institutions of Nepal and the Czech Republic issued statements on Feb. 7 and 12 to hail the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The editorial board of the Nepali newspaper Arpan said:
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in launching satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 on Feb. 7.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are making much ado, branding the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes as "inter-continental ballistic missile test" and "threat to security and peace".
					
					 This is an intensive expression of the fear and uneasiness about the tremendous national power of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's successful satellite launch conducted under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un is giving great joy and conviction to the world progressives.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the Marshal and the Korean people on the successful satellite launch.
					
					 The editorial board of the Czech newspaper Proscejobska Pravda denounced the U.S. and its followers for getting frantic in their moves to stifle the DPRK under the pretext of its satellite launch.
					
					 It also protested against the U.S. pushing the situation to an extreme pitch of strain while introducing arms equipment into south Korea to attack the DPRK.

articles.title: Premian a contribuyentes a lanzamiento de satelite Kwangmyongsong-4
articles.content:
Premian a contribuyentes a lanzamiento de satelite Kwangmyongsong-4
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar por la manana del dia 17 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de premiacion del Partido y el Estado a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios quienes contribuyeron al exitoso lanzamiento del satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, participo en la ceremonia de otorgamiento. 
					
					El Mariscal proclamo el inicio de la ceremonia de premiacion y pronuncio un discurso de felicitacion.
					
					Son patriotas mejores y admirables heroes de Corea del Juche los conquistadores del cosmos que pusieron de pleno mnifiesto el orgullo y el prestigio del gran Estado nuestro y el indoblegable impetu del pueblo poderoso y valiente, dijo.
					
					El pleno exito del lanzamiento del satelite es el producto de la ardiente fidelidad al Partido, el patriotismo y el precioso trabajo de los cientificos de Corea Juche, subrayo.
					
					Acoto que aprecia el patriotismo de los soldados cientificos quienes estan decididos a dedicar todo lo suyo por el Partido y la revolucion,.
					
					En representacion del Partido, el Mariscal les volvio a dar su agradecimiento a los conquistadores del cosmos quienes infundieron la firme confianza y fuerza a nuestro ejercito y pueblo que avanzan con vigor hacia el Septimo Congreso del PTC e hicieron aporte especial a materializar el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Mariscal aclaro la posicion de principios y las tareas estrategicas de nuestro Partido para la exploracion espacial.
					
					Asevero que el trabajo por dominar el cosmos no es simplemente el camino de ciencias, sino es el de la revolucion y de la independencia y autososten y es la lucha de defensa al Lider y a la politica del partido para materializar los legados de los grandes Lideres, y es la enconada lucha clasista contra las fuerzas hostiles que tratan de arrebatarnos la paz y la soberania,.
					
					Continuo que para abrir un ancho camino para la conquista del cosmos, los condecorados deben lanzar de manera mas rapida y contenta muchos satelites practicos de Corea del Juche al desplegar con dinamismo la emulacion de cerebros y la campana para alcanzar los niveles sofisticados segun la demanda de nueva era de Chollima, la de Mallima (significan los caballos alados).
					
					Diciendo que el sector de las ciencias espaciales debe adelantar en glorificar el VII Congreso del PTC como gran conclave glorioso de los triunfadores, presento las tareas y remedios concretos para ello.
					
					Apunto que deben glorificar para siempre las hazanas inmortales del Dirigente realizadas en la construccion de la potencia de cosmos al materializar cabalmente sin demora, vacilacion y falta el legado del Dirigente tomandolo como guia programatica, establecer con firmeza el sistema de direccion unica del Partido y poner de pleno manifiesto el espiritu indoblegable de Kunjari y el revolucionario de autoconfianza.
					
					Es nuestra meta estrategica el avance al cosmos que sirve de fuerza motriz del desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas y la economia del futuro, dijo y exhorto a acelerar con mas vigor la exploracion espacial segun el plan quinquenal estatal para el desarrollo cosmico.
					
					Luego, se dio lectura a un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El Mariscal otorgo personalmente la Orden Kim Jong Il, maxima orden de nuestro pais, el titulo de Heroe de la RPDC, maximo honor del ciudadano, la Medalla Estrella de Oro y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a los contribuyentes al lanzamiento exitoso del satelite.
					
					Por la tarde del dia, continuo la ceremonia de premiacion del Partido y el Estado a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios de la rama correspondiente que aportaron al exitoso lanzamiento del satelite.
					
					En la ocasion fueron otorgados a ellos el Premio Kim Jong Il, los relojes con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el diploma de honor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el diploma de honor del Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un, el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il, los titulos de Cientifico del Pueblo y del cientifico benemerito y otros titulos honorarios, la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase, la Orden del Trabajo y otras ordenes y medallas.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia junto a contribuyentes a lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia junto a contribuyentes a lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto a los cientificos, tecnicos, trabajadores y funcionarios quienes manifestaron por todo el mundo la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso de la potencia del monte Paektu mediante el exitoso lanzamiento del satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4.
					  El Mariscal se fotografio junto a los conquistadores del cosmos tras felicitar calidamente a ellos que con el lanzamiento del satelite Kwangmyongsong-4 contribuyeron a festejar el significado Dia de la Estrella Luz como gran jubilo sin precedente e infundieron al pueblo coreano la fe en la victoria con motivo del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					  Terminada la filmacion, el Mariscal dio respuesta con mano alzada a los participantes.
					
					  Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos crearan incesantes milagros e innovaciones en la investigacion cientifica por el desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas cosmicas del pais y cumpliran su deber como precursores y jinetes en materializar la politica del Partido de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas.
					
					   Estuvieron presentes Ri Man Gon y Pak To Chun.

articles.title: Se despliega en RPDC labor para prevenir Zika
articles.content:
Se despliega en RPDC labor para prevenir Zika
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- En estos dias, se desarrolla en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el trabajo para prevenir Zika que se transmite rapidamente en el ambito mundial.
					Este virus aparecio por primera vez en el cuerpo de un mono que habita en el bosque de Zika de Uganda y las personas se contagian en muchos casos por los mosquitos, dijo asi Hong Sun Gwang, subjefe del Buro Estatal del Control de Higiene del Ministerio de Salud Publica.
					
					Zika no es tan peligroso como Ebola, pero provoca graves consecuencias a las embarazadas, por ejemplo, impide el crecimiento de nervio cerebral de embriones.
					
					Al respecto, se toman las medidas de servicios higienico-profilacticos para dar a conocer a las personas el conocimiento sobre Zika e impedir la penetracion de este virus en nuestro pais.
					
					En este trabajo, toman delantera la Instituto Superior de Medicina de Pyongyang, adscrito a la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Comite Estatal de Control de la Calidad y el Centro Nacional de Higiene y Prevencion.
					
					Surte efecto el sistema de informacion de vigilancia en tiempo real, establecido entre los organos de higiene y prevencion de la central y las localidades.
					
					Los organos de supervision fronteriza efectuan con responsabilidad una inspeccion estricta sobre las personas y cargas que vienen de las regiones contagiadas por Zika.
					
					Las unidades de vecinos y los organos realizan efectivamente la propaganda higienica ante los habitantes, sobre todo, a las embarazadas para explicar el motivo, la ruta de contagio y la peligrosidad de Zika y las medidas de prevencion.
					
					Los medicos de zona ejecutan normalmente el chequeo medico a los habitantes de la zona encargada.
					
					Y se realiza masivamente el trabajo para aniquilar mosquitos que pasaron el invierno y preparar perfectamente los mosquiteros en las viviendas, hospitales y otros lugares.

articles.title: ACNC califica de autodestruccion intento de emplazar THAAD en territorio surcoreano
articles.content:
ACNC califica de autodestruccion intento de emplazar THAAD en territorio surcoreano
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 7, la banda surcoreana de Park Geun-hye publico oficialmente que realizara con su amo norteamericano la consulta para emplazar el sistema antimisiles THAAD en el suelo surcoreano. 
					Al respecto, los medios de prensa surcoreanos revelan que ya en los contactos informales anteriores, Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea discutieron en detalles los asuntos de gastos del emplazamiento de THAAD, la carga de gastos de gestion, el ofrecimiento de terreno y establecimientos basicos, etc. 
					
					El hecho demuestra que el emplazamiento de THAAD, que provoca gran preocupacion de los paises asiaticos, no esta en discusion sino se pone en la practica. 
					
					El sistema antimisiles THAAD fue desarrollado por la compania estadounidense Lockheed Martin. Durante varios anos ultimos se ha aumentado su alcance de tiro gastando decenas de millones de US$. Es reconocido como armamento capaz de atacar hasta las aeronaves supersonicas fuera de espacio atmosferico. 
					
					Dicen que la distancia de deteccion de radar de la banda de frecuencia X, componente principal de THAAD es de miles de km.
					
					En el caso de emplazarse el THAAD en el suelo surcoreano, la esfera de alcance militar de EE.UU. se ampliara a la profundidad del continente asiatico, se agudizara la carrera armamentista y la de desarrollo de armas sofisticados y se aumentara la tension militar en la region. 
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye actua como brigada de choque para el cumplimiento de las maniobras hegemonicas de EE.UU. tendentes a neutralizar con el sistema antimisiles la capacidad de ataque militar de los paises asiaticos en desarrollo vertiginoso, en particular, las potencias regionales y tomar el control politico, economico y militar en esta region. 
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye, enemiga comun de los paises asiaticos, les preconizan como acompanantes comerciales mientras les acarrean el nubarron de la guerra nuclear sumandose a las maniobras de EE.UU.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos justifican el emplazamiento de THAAD pretextando la "amenaza nuclear y de misil" de la RPDC. Pero, ningun pais sera enganado por esta sofisteria. 
					
					El fuerte disuasivo de guerra de autodefensa de la RPDC constituye un medio para castigar al imperialismo norteamericano, enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Cuanto mas los titeres surcoreanos actuen con imprudencia con la ilusion de obtener todos sus designios incluso el aplastamiento a la parte connacional bajo el amparo de su amo norteamericano tanto mas seran objetos de primer castigo despiadada de nuestro militares y civiles.
					
					La tension politica y militar que se agravara por el emplazamiento de THAAD en el suelo surcoreano no puede excluir los conflictos fisicos. Y en este caso, el suelo surcoreano, convertido en la base avanzada nuclear a favor del cumplimiento de la estrategia hegemonica de EE.UU. sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico, sera el primer blanco de ataque de los paises perifericos. 
					
					Pues, el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea adelantara la autodestruccion de los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye debe actuar con prudencia teniendolo presente.
